page.title: 01Nantyffyllon School
page.content: On Friday an ordinary day in school begins like this. I come to school at about 8.50am and then I go in to class to get my chair out. Then we all have assembly, after assembly we go in to our classes and have the dreaded spelling test and then we have play which lasts for quarter of an hour. Then we do Maths until dinner time break which lasts for one hour. After dinner break we go over the park where the girls play rounders and the boys play cricket. When we come back its usually break time but some times we are late in the afternoon we have a quiz boys against girls and that goes on for half an hour and then we go home.
